comment.author: 7471115@N08
comment._content: I wish the National Museum of the American Indian here in DC had more cool artifacts as portrayed in these photos! With all of the space in that lovely building, and so few artifacts on display, I wonder where most of the material is archived.

comment.realname: Smithsonian National Museum of the American Indian
comment.author: 36183987@N07
comment._content: Thanks for your comment. Yes, it’s true that most of the objects and photographs in NMAI’s collection are not on display at the Museum on the National Mall. The collections and archival materials are stored off site at our Cultural Resources Center in Suitland, Maryland: www.nmai.si.edu/subpage.cfm?subpage=collections&secon... For further details regarding the archive collection or scheduling a visit please see our website: www.nmai.si.edu/subpage.cfm?subpage=collections&secon...
comment.authorname: Smithsonian National Museum of the American Indian
